trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CacheVirtualItems> event occurs when a new area of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> in virtual mode is exposed and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> determines a new range of items is needed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CacheVirtualItems>evento ocorre quando uma nova área de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>no modo virtual está exposta e a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>determina que é necessário um novo intervalo de itens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CacheVirtualItems>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CacheVirtualItemsEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified starting and ending indices.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CacheVirtualItemsEventArgs"> </xref> classe com o início especificado e final índices.

trans-unit.source: The starting index of a range of items needed by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> for the next <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem"></xref> event that occurs.
trans-unit.target: O índice de início de um intervalo de itens necessários para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> pela próxima <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem"> </xref> eventos que ocorre.

trans-unit.source: The ending index of a range of items needed by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> for the next <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem"></xref> event that occurs.
trans-unit.target: O índice de fim de um intervalo de itens necessários para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> pela próxima <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem"> </xref> eventos que ocorre.

trans-unit.source: Gets the ending index for the range of values needed by a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control in virtual mode.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice final para o intervalo de valores necessários para um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> controlo no modo virtual.

trans-unit.source: The range of values specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CacheVirtualItemsEventArgs.StartIndex%2A> and EndIndex properties represents the range of values most likely needed by a virtual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control for the next occurrence of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem> event.
trans-unit.target: O intervalo de valores especificados pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CacheVirtualItemsEventArgs.StartIndex%2A>e propriedades de EndIndex representa o intervalo de valores provavelmente necessários para uma virtual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlo para a próxima ocorrência de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CacheVirtualItemsEventArgs.StartIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index at the end of the range of values needed by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: O índice no fim do intervalo de valores necessários para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the starting index for a range of values needed by a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control in virtual mode.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice de início de um intervalo de valores necessários para um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> controlo no modo virtual.

trans-unit.source: The range of values specified by the StartIndex and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CacheVirtualItemsEventArgs.EndIndex%2A> properties represents the range of values most likely needed by a virtual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control for the next occurrence of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem> event.
trans-unit.target: O intervalo de valores especificados pelo StartIndex e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CacheVirtualItemsEventArgs.EndIndex%2A>Propriedades representa o intervalo de valores provavelmente necessários para uma virtual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlo para a próxima ocorrência de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CacheVirtualItemsEventArgs.EndIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index at the start of the range of values needed by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: O índice no início do intervalo de valores necessários para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> controlo.
